title: Help draw the world’s most collaborative animation.
cta: Help draw the world’s most collaborative animation.
definition:
Your contribution will just take a few seconds.
It’s like the game of telephone, but visual.
hard: Not sold yet? Here is a test animation by the team at The Pudding.
hard2: This is essentially an experiment in generation loss; showing how the original drawing mutates as it is traced by more and more people.
harder: Need more of a nudge? Fine. free prizes…
statsWaiting: people are waiting for their turn.
stepNotify:
How do you want to be notified of your turn?
choose one or both
thanks: Thanks for joining! We’ll be in touch soon.
rejoined: Thanks for rejoining! We’ll be in touch soon.
issue: There was an issue joining. Please try again later.
messageP:
Your info will be deleted when the project is done.
You’ll get just three messages
messageLi: When it is your turn to draw
playground: While you wait you can make your own little animation.

draw.thanks: Thanks for waiting! Now it’s your turn.
draw.task: Please trace the last person’s drawing as best you can.
draw.done: All done! Thanks for participating. [Tk more info here.]

faq.q: What are you doing with my phone number/email?
faq.a: We will send you a few messages during the project about your turn then delete them when the project is done (about a month maybe)
